18415C72.Line7.1086F0: Nearly. Missin’ one key ingredient - the blood fungus. A right bastard to grow since it needs a living host. I grafted a patch onto a creature outside the reservoir ruins.

F0C50634.Line9.1086F0: Once it’s collected, travel south. Look for the corpse mound. I will meet you there at the disease’s source.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Do you have everything needed to cure this sickness?”
